Detailed Description

The header file describes the cluster specific APIs from high zgp.

Version:
: 1_0

Microchip Corporation: http://www.microchip.com

Sending read attribute command.

Parameters:
[in]addr- dst addr
[in]dir- server to client / client to server

uint8_t *  payLoad

Send ZGP cluster command in raw mode.

Parameters:
[in]addr- dst addr
[in]dir- server to client / client to server
[in]cmdId- cluster cmd id
[in]payloadLength- length of payload to be sent
[in]payload- payload to be sent

uint8_t ZGPH_ParseGpdIdFromPayload ( ZGP_ApplicationId_t  appId,
ZGP_GpdId_t *  gpdId,
uint8_t *  endpoint,
uint8_t *  payload 
)

Parsing gpdId field from the rxd payload.

Parameters:
[in]appId- application id gpdId - gpdId to be populated endpoint - endpoint to be populated payload - rxd payload
Returns:
gpdId length - INVALID_CMD_LENGTH in case of invalid app. id proper length otherwise
